TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit NetworkInformationPermission extends System.Security.CodeAccessPermission implements class System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission
Public NotInheritable Class NetworkInformationPermission Inherits CodeAccessPermission Implements IUnrestrictedPermission
public ref class NetworkInformationPermission sealed : System::Security::CodeAccessPermission, System::Security::Permissions::IUnrestrictedPermission
type NetworkInformationPermission = class inherit CodeAccessPermission interface IUnrestrictedPermission

summary.span: 控制對本機電腦之網路資訊及流量統計資料的存取。

span.span: Controls access to network information and traffic statistics for the local computer.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此權限來保護中的類別所傳回的資料命名空間。This permission is used to secure data returned by the classes in the namespace. 宣告式安全性，使用類別。For declarative security, use the class. ## Examples 下列範例會建立不受限制的使用權限物件。The following example creates an unrestricted permission object. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法來修改網路資訊的存取權加入目前的權限的狀態。Use this method to modify access to network information by adding to the state of the current permission. ## Examples 下列範例會建立空的權限物件，然後將它加入。The following example creates an empty permission object and then adds to it. summary.span: 建立並傳回目前權限與指定權限交集的權限。

span.span: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: ，表示目前使用權限和指定之使用權限的交集。

span.span: A that represents the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果交集是空的，或 為 ，則這個新使用權限便為 。

span.span: This new permission is if the intersection is empty or is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 兩個權限的交集是描述的狀態兩者所共同描述的權限。The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the state they both describe in common. 只有通過這兩個原始的使用權限的需求將會通過交集。Only a demand that passes both original permissions will pass the intersection. ## Examples 下列範例會建立的現有權限物件交集的使用權限物件。The following example creates a permission object that is the intersection of existing permission objects. summary.span: 判斷目前權限是否為指定權限的子集。

span.span: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果目前權限是指定權限的子集，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目前的使用權限指定完全包含在指定的權限的狀態，目前的權限會是所指定權限的子集。The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission specifies a state that is wholly contained by the specified permission. 這個方法會傳回 true，如果目前權限，表示沒有存取受保護的資源比指定的權限。If this method returns true, the current permission represents no more access to the protected resource than does the specified permission. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示兩個權限的子集關係。The following code example displays the subset relationship between two permissions. Public Overrides Function Union (target As IPermission) As IPermission

param.name: target
param.span: 要與目前權限合併的 權限。

span.span: A permission to combine with the current permission.

summary.span: 建立使用權限，做為這個使用權限和指定之使用權限的聯集。

span.span: Creates a permission that is the union of this permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 代表目前權限與指定權限聯集的新權限。

span.span: A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回代表的權限的所有狀態，表示由目前使用權限和指定的權限。The method returns a permission that represents all the states represented by both the current permission and the specified permission. 任何通過其中之一權限的需求會傳遞它們的聯集。Any demand that passes either permission passes their union. ## Examples 下列範例會建立現有的使用權限物件的聯集的權限物件。The following example creates a permission object that is the union of existing permission objects.
